name: get_region_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool gis_engine.
Tool description: Provide regions, cities and districts per countries
API description: Fetch the details of a specific region within a given country using the RapidAPI GIS Engine.

region_code.description: The code representing the specific region to look up.

country_code.description: The code representing the country in which the region is located.
